017package com.fns.grivet.service;
018
019import java.sql.CallableStatement;
020import java.sql.SQLException;
021import java.util.Iterator;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.Set;
024import org.json.JSONArray;
025import org.json.JSONObject;
026import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
027import org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException;
028import org.springframework.jdbc.core.CallableStatementCallback;
029import org.springframework.jdbc.core.CallableStatementCreator;
030import org.springframework.jdbc.core.CallableStatementCreatorFactory;
031import org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate;
032import org.springframework.jdbc.core.SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor;
033import org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam.MapSqlParameterSource;
034import org.springframework.jdbc.core.namedparam.NamedParameterJdbcTemplate;
035import org.springframework.jdbc.support.rowset.SqlRowSet;
036import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;
037import org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;
038import org.springframework.util.Assert;
039import org.springframework.util.CollectionUtils;
040import org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap;
041import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
042import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
043import com.fns.grivet.query.NamedQuery;
044import com.fns.grivet.repo.NamedQueryRepository;
045
046@Service
047public class NamedQueryService {
048    @SuppressWarnings("all")
049    private static final org.slf4j.Logger log = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(NamedQueryService.class);
050    private final NamedQueryRepository namedQueryRepository;
051    private final JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;
052    private final NamedParameterJdbcTemplate namedParameterJdbcTemplate;
053    private final ObjectMapper mapper;
054
055    @Autowired
056    public NamedQueryService(NamedQueryRepository namedQueryRepository, JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate, ObjectMapper mapper) {
057        this.namedQueryRepository = namedQueryRepository;
058        this.jdbcTemplate = jdbcTemplate;
059        this.namedParameterJdbcTemplate = new NamedParameterJdbcTemplate(jdbcTemplate);
060        this.mapper = mapper;
061    }
062
063    @Transactional
064    public void create(NamedQuery namedQuery) {
065        namedQueryRepository.save(namedQuery);
066    }
067
068    @Transactional(readOnly = true)
069    public String get(String name, MultiValueMap<String, ?> parameters) {
070        NamedQuery namedQuery = namedQueryRepository.findByName(name);
071        Assert.notNull(namedQuery, "No query found that matches name [%s]!".formatted(name));
072        MapSqlParameterSource parameterSource = namedQuery.asParameterSource(parameters);
073        String sql = namedQuery.getQuery();
074        Map<String, String> sqlParams = namedQuery.getParams();
075        SqlRowSet rowSet = null;
076        if (parameterSource != null) {
077            // check that all params were supplied...
078            Set<String> queryParamKeys = sqlParams.keySet();
079            Set<String> parametersKeys = parameters.keySet();
080            Assert.isTrue(parametersKeys.containsAll(queryParamKeys), "Query cannot be executed! Missing query parameters!");
081            switch (namedQuery.getType()) {
082            case SELECT: 
083                rowSet = namedParameterJdbcTemplate.queryForRowSet(sql, parameterSource);
084                break;
085            case SPROC: 
086                String sproc = getProcedure(sql, queryParamKeys);
087                CallableStatementCreatorFactory factory = new CallableStatementCreatorFactory(sproc, namedQuery.asSqlParameters(parameters));
088                CallableStatementCreator csc = factory.newCallableStatementCreator(parameterSource.getValues());
089                rowSet = callSproc(csc);
090                break;
091            default: 
092                break;
093            }
094        } else {
095            Assert.isTrue(sqlParams.isEmpty(), "Query cannot be executed! Query expects parameters!");
096            // ignore any supplied request params
097            switch (namedQuery.getType()) {
098            case SELECT: 
099                rowSet = namedParameterJdbcTemplate.getJdbcOperations().query(sql, new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor());
100                break;
101            case SPROC: 
102                String sproc = getProcedure(sql, null);
103                CallableStatementCreatorFactory factory = new CallableStatementCreatorFactory(sproc, namedQuery.asSqlParameters(parameters));
104                CallableStatementCreator csc = factory.newCallableStatementCreator((Map<String, ?>) null);
105                rowSet = callSproc(csc);
106                break;
107            default: 
108                break;
109            }
110        }
111        return mapRows(rowSet);
112    }
113
114    @Transactional
115    public void delete(String name) {
116        NamedQuery nq = namedQueryRepository.findByName(name);
117        if (nq != null) {
118            namedQueryRepository.delete(nq);
119        }
120    }
121
122    protected SqlRowSet callSproc(CallableStatementCreator csc) {
123        return jdbcTemplate.execute(csc, new CallableStatementCallback<SqlRowSet>() {
124            @Override
125            public SqlRowSet doInCallableStatement(CallableStatement cs) throws SQLException, DataAccessException {
126                log.debug("Stored procedure to be executed: " + cs.toString());
127                return new SqlRowSetResultSetExtractor().extractData(cs.executeQuery());
128            }
129        });
130    }
131
132    protected String mapRows(SqlRowSet rowSet) {
133        JSONArray jsonArray = new JSONArray();
134        if (rowSet != null) {
135            String[] columnNames = rowSet.getMetaData().getColumnNames();
136            JSONObject jsonObject = null;
137            while (rowSet.next()) {
138                jsonObject = new JSONObject();
139                for (String columnName : columnNames) {
140                    jsonObject.put(columnName, rowSet.getObject(columnName));
141                }
142                jsonArray.put(jsonObject);
143            }
144        }
145        return jsonArray.toString();
146    }
147
148    private String getProcedure(String sql, Set<String> queryParamKeys) {
149        if (!CollectionUtils.isEmpty(queryParamKeys)) {
150            for (String k : queryParamKeys) {
151                sql = sql.replace(":" + k, "?");
152            }
153        }
154        if (!sql.startsWith("{")) {
155            sql = "%s%s".formatted("{", sql);
156        }
157        if (!sql.endsWith("}")) {
158            sql = "%s%s".formatted(sql, "}");
159        }
160        return sql;
161    }
162
163    @Transactional(readOnly = true)
164    public JSONArray all() {
165        JSONArray result = new JSONArray();
166        Iterable<NamedQuery> iterable = namedQueryRepository.findAll();
167        Assert.notNull(iterable, "No named queries are registered!");
168        Iterator<NamedQuery> it = iterable.iterator();
169        NamedQuery nq = null;
170        JSONObject jo = null;
171        JsonNode jn = null;
172        while (it.hasNext()) {
173            nq = it.next();
174            jn = mapper.valueToTree(nq);
175            jo = new JSONObject(jn.toString());
176            jo.remove("id");
177            jo.remove("createdTime");
178            result.put(jo);
179        }
180        return result;
181    }
182}
